title: Event
short-description: Visualize the raw data indexed by Splunk Enterprise, with field metadata.

title: Maps
short-description: Plot geographical data on integrated maps.

title: HTML
short-description: Include static HTML content.  Useful for descriptions, links, and context.

title: Chart
short-description: Add graphs, charts, and gauges to dashboards.

title: Chart Overlay
short-description: Show limits and other data on one chart.

title: Table Element
short-description: Create a simple table using the dashboard editor.

title: Table Element with Data Overlay
short-description: Add data overlay modes (heatmap, high/values) using the dashboard editor.

title: Table Element with Sparklines
short-description: Configure basic and advanced sparkline formatting options.

title: Table Icon Set (Rangemap)
short-description: Use Javascript and CSS in tables to convert rangemap results into icons.

title: Table Icon Set (Inline)
short-description: Add icons to table cells based on custom conditions.

title: Table Row Highlighting
short-description: Color table rows based on conditions having multiple field values.

title: Table Cell Highlighting
short-description: Color table cells based on conditions having multiple field values.

title: Table with Data Bars
short-description: Add icons and color table rows, based on search results.

title: Single Value Element
short-description: Demonstrate a single value element with basic drilldown and rangemap configurations.

title: Single Value Decorations
short-description: Insert icon sets based on a value rangemap, for a customized single value element.

title: Single Value With Trend
short-description: Display the customized annotations trend, for single value element.

title: Inline Search
short-description: Use a search query to power dashboard elements.

title: Report Search
short-description: Use a Splunk Enterprise Report to power dashboard elements.

title: Post Process Search
short-description: Use a post process query to further filter a global search.

title: Real-time Searches
short-description: Use a real-time search for continuous trend updating.

title: Panel Refresh Controls
short-description: Manual and auto refresh controls for each panel on a dashboard.

title: Text Form Input Element
short-description: Set search terms by populating a form with textbox input.

title: Dropdown Form Input Element
short-description: Set search terms by populating a form with one or more dropdown options.

title: Radio Form Input Element
short-description: Set search terms by populating a form with one or more sets of radio buttons.

title: Multiple Selection
short-description: Include a multi-select input.

title: Multiple Checkbox
short-description: Include multiple checkbox selection.

title: Time Picker Form Input
short-description: Add a timerange picker to modify a search time span.

title: Cascading Form Input
short-description: Power a form input from other input values to narrow search results.

title: Form Input - Advanced Controls
short-description: Demonstrate various form input operations.

title: Custom Link Switcher
short-description: Toggle dashboard content using a list of links.

title: Drilldown Single Value
short-description: Link to other pages from the single value visualization.

title: Drilldown Chart
short-description: Click on chart content to discover the underlying events.

title: Drilldown Table
short-description: Discover the underlying events by clicking on table content.

title: Drilldown URL Field Value
short-description: Configure drilldown to redirect users to the url set as the field value.

title: Drilldown Event
short-description: Select parts of event field metadata to narrow a search.

title: Drilldown Maps
short-description: Toggle map drilldown on or off.

title: Dynamic Drilldown
short-description: Control the drilldown destination and content by passing click information to a linked form.

title: Contextual Drilldown (In-page)
short-description: Drilldown to access contextual information without leaving the page.

title: Pan and Zoom Chart Controls
short-description: Charts allow you to select a range to zoom in.  Alternatively you can use that data to drilldown further into your data.

title: Multiple Panels to a Row
short-description: Organize similar content in a single row.

title: Row Grouping with Single Values
short-description: Group multiple single value elements, aligning horizontally.

title: Row Grouping with Charts
short-description: Group multiple charts, tables, html panels, or events, aligning vertically.

title: Custom Layout: Dark
short-description: Apply page-level, custom stylesheets.

title: Image Overlay With Single Values
short-description: Display workflow status visually using an image, and grouped single value elements.

title: Layout Customization: Panel Width
short-description: Customize the width of dashboard panels.

title: Form Elements Within Panels
short-description: Example of placing form elements within a panel.

title: Time Range Picker Within Panels
short-description: Example of placing a time range picker within a panel.

title: D3 Chart Overlay
short-description: Define a custom chart overlay, using D3.

title: Tag Cloud
short-description: Add search-driven, custom visualizations to a dashboard, using JavaScript.

title: Tag Cloud with Auto-Discovery
short-description: Re-use custom visualizations across different dashboards without using separate scripts.

title: D3 Bubble Chart
short-description: Add a bubble chart to a dashboard.

title: D3 Parallel Coordinates
short-description: Add a parallel coordinates plot to a dashboard.

title: D3 Force-Directed Graph
short-description: Add force-directed graphs to a dashboard

title: Custom token definitions
short-description: Use JavaScript to set tokens in panel titles, html panels, and for drilldown.

title: Custom token from REST endpoint
short-description: Set a dashboard token, specified in a custom configuration file and retrieved using REST.
